original_text: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
korean_text: 벨라의 아들들은 에스본과 우시와 웃시엘과 여리못과 이리 다섯 사람이니 다 그 집의 우두머리요 큰 용사라 그 계보대로 계수하면 이만 이천삼십사 명이며

sentences.original_text: Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five;
sentences.korean_translation: 에스본과 웃시와 �시시엘과 여리못과 이리로 다섯 명이며

sentences.original_text: heads of the house of their fathers,
and were reckoned by their genealogies
twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
